divs: sighting detailswell, i filled this entire thing out once so this might be shorter. the past week i have been seeing clear\silver orbs going back and forth. when they take off, it is so fast i can not follow with my eyes. at night have been the 'bright orbs'. they sit in the sky for hours then are just gone. there are colorful ones that i can see as well. i have only seen one classic 'disc' and it zipped in front of me when i was recording a video. i check all objects with the astro and flight sites to be positive. i moved here three years ago and have seen so many things since.i loose sight when they flash and go dark or take off.
Summary: Red/Orange orbs, Clear silver, and one Disc
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in San Tan Valley
There were no other sightings in San Tan Valley on or around March 10th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
